item.title: Matrix Bots with Golang
item.author: jakob.kuelzer@gmail.com (Jakob Külzer)
item.description: I’ve been running a Matrix homeserver for about a year now and I’m happy with it. It runs on my Kubernetes cluster on a few Raspberry Pis, doesn’t require a lot of attention and is fairly resource efficient. But I always wanted to write my own chatbots to do things for me and recently I finally started looking into matrix bots and how to implement them in Go for easy cross compile and statically linked binaries.
